taskman.frontend.sections

Class MenuSection

  • java.lang.Object
    • taskman.frontend.sections.Section
      • taskman.frontend.sections.MenuSection

  • public class MenuSection
extends Section
    This class is responsible for showing a menu to the user and activating the appropriate method.
    Author:
    Alexander Braekevelt
